code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieTable=()=>{const[movieData,setMovieData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('https://cinepedia-dsrv.onrender.com/api/movies');const data=await response.json();setMovieData(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"",children:"Search"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"",children:movieData&&movieData.results?movieData.results.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"",width:"48px",height:"72px",src:movie.cover_img,alt:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:movie.sinopsis})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Director: ",movie.director]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Rating: ",movie.rating]})]})]},movie.movie_id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})})]});};export default MovieTable;
